affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: HP Removal
cmb:
MANA COST: 120/120/120/120
COOLDOWN: 25
desc: Binds several enemy units together, causing 25% of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.
notes: Damage will not disable abilities or items like Blink Dagger which require player based damage.
lore: An ancient incantation that links the vital energies of multiple lifeforms into one collective body.
name: warlock_fatal_bonds

cmb:
MANA COST: 90/110/130/150
COOLDOWN: 16
desc: Demnok whispers an incantation, healing a friendly unit or damaging an enemy unit over time.
notes: A hero affected by Shadow Word may be denied once it falls below 25% of its maximum health.
lore: Warlock arcane arts have a myriad of uses, allowing them to be powerful friendly enchantments or damaging curses.
name: warlock_shadow_word

attrib:
RADIUS: 650 / 650 / 650 / 650
SLOW RATE: 7% / 14% / 21% / 28%
MAX DURATION: 16
cmb:
MANA COST: 100/110/120/130
COOLDOWN: 50/46/42/38
desc: CHANNELED - A powerful slowing current that grows stronger as it's channelled. Lasts up to 12 seconds, slowing enemies up to 84%.  Enemies are slowed for 3 seconds after leaving the area or the spell ends.
notes: The slow increase is based on length of the channel, not the duration an enemy was standing in the area.
lore: Demnok manipulates space-time, impairing entire armies.
name: warlock_upheaval

attrib:
RADIUS: 600
GOLEM HP: 900 / 1200 / 1500
GOLEM DAMAGE: 75 / 100 / 125
GOLEM ARMOR: 6 / 9 / 12
SCEPTER NUMBER OF GOLEMS: 2
SCEPTER HP/DAMAGE REDUCTION: 25%
SCEPTER BOUNTY REDUCTION: 50%
cmb:
MANA COST: 200/300/400
COOLDOWN: 165
desc:
Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for one second. The Golem lives 60 seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
Magic immune units will be stunned.
This ability destroys trees in its area of effect.
lore: Demnok unleashes the captive spirit in his Dreadwood staff, causing destruction in enemy ranks.
name: warlock_rain_of_chaos
